org.cytoscape.dyn.internal.view.layout.algorithm.util
Class DijkstraDistance<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.cytoscape.dyn.internal.view.layout.algorithm.util.DijkstraDistance<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Distance<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DijkstraShortestPath
public class DijkstraDistance<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Distance<T>

DijkstraDistance calculates distances in a specified graph, using Dijkstra's single-source-shortest-path algorithm. All edge weights in the graph must be nonnegative.

Author:
Joshua O'Madadhain, Tom Nelson converted to jung2, Sabina Sara Pfister - adaptation for Cytoscape
